thread.title: Newlywed Bigg Boss 10 contestant Mona Lisa is back to work, posts pic from shoot
thread.title_full: Newlywed Bigg Boss 10 contestant Mona Lisa is back to work, posts pic from shoot - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Newlywed Bigg Boss 10 contestant Mona Lisa is back to work, posts pic from shoot
text:
Mona Lisa aka Antara Biswas , who got married to her boyfriend and colleague from industry Vikrant Singh on national television, in the Bigg Boss 10 house is now happy in her comfortable space.
The ambitious and much liked by many actress is back to work soon after her marriage. She has started shooting for her next Bhojpuri film 'Jai Shri Ram', in which she will be seen opposite her husband.
READ ALSO:
Bigg Boss 10 contestants chill at Salman Khan's starry after party
Mona has been posting pictures and videos of hers from the shoot location. She wrote, "Shooting Starts For "JAI SHREE RAM"."
Shooting Starts For "JAI SHREE RAM"...ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™ pic.twitter.com/gSRXPudPs0
â€” Monalisa (@MonalisaAntara) February 3, 2017
Mona is also happy to get her personal makeup artists back after almost four months'. She shared a video of her make up kit and the set of her movie. She wrote, "After 4months we are together again....me n my cute Personal Artists....feel so comfortable with them."
After 4months we are together again....me n my cute Personal Artists....feel so comfortable with them....ğŸ’„ğŸ’…ğŸ»ğŸ’ƒğŸ»ğŸ’ƒğŸ»ğŸ’ƒğŸ» pic.twitter.com/07YZ6ztCed

Intro scene....feeling so different....happy meeee...ğŸ’ƒğŸ»ğŸ’ƒğŸ»ğŸ’ƒğŸ» pic.twitter.com/6U63ujJ4fB
â€” Monalisa (@MonalisaAntara) February 3, 2017
Mona Lisa was one of the strongest contestants on the show. Even though she failed at completing several tasks, but her fans kept her going by pouring in votes in her favour.
One of the most sought after actresses in the Bhojpuri film industry, Mona has always proved her versatility in her work.
